Qualifications Summary
I am an Environment, Health and Safety (EHS)  professional with  project
management experience  spanning  about  seven  years.  I  also have a
Bachelor of Science Degree in Environmental Science earned in 2011
with several short-term training courses to deepen and widen my scope of
knowledge and skills. I am well read; passionate about enforcement and
implementation and; have thorough understanding of Occupational Health
and  Safety  as  well  as  environmental  laws,  procedures  and  standards
applicable in different sectors including, but not limited to, the Construction,
Transport and Logistics, Manufacturing, Hotel and; Oil & Gas industries.
